thread.title: Nirupam Nigam

author: Nirupam Nigam
title: Nirupam Nigam
text: I booked a flight through their pet scam - bravofly. AirAsia canceled the route A MONTH AGO and returned the money to bravofly's account A MONTH AGO (according to air asia). Here I am stuck in Mauritius without enough money to get back to the US and go back to work. Everytime I call I'm promised they'll "work on it" but there's "no indication they received the refund" contrary to Air Asia's statement. This is by far the worst company I've dealt with and they've made my life a living hell. As a contractor for the department of commerce, I feel it's time to get the FTC and Better Business Bureau involved.
